phrases: Hm...
You could smell it from here?
What made you say that?
Oh, okay...
I see why you come here so much.
I am up, I am awake...
You are fine here on the deck.
What will we do?
I guess, boring.
Excuse me...
I need a moment.
That would be difficult and painful.
I would not expect you to.
Huh?
I decided to learn the sneak attack, Spider, and paid forty silvers for it.
Thank you!
If you were, you could say goodbye to your neck and body.
I will die!
I am not kidding!
What a drab man you are.
Yes, dull!
It is not once a day, but I do see it pretty often
Oh yeah.
We decided to take the day off.
Repeating a yesterday filled with scrapes,
We clear the path to a hopeful tomorrow.
I wonder what remains
in both these tiny hands?
The voice I raised upwards scattered into the air.
The reality I have gamed is hazy,
and even if I cannot see ahead of me,
I can keep moving forward on this long road
if I am with you.
Connecting a bond covered in dust,
We join back to back in the past and future.
Repeating an answer full of mistakes,
I will reach out my hands to seek the light, again and again.
After talking it over, we all decided to take the day off today.
We had a lot going on until yesterday...
But, I wonder what this strange feeling is.
What do I usually do on days off?
A day off, huh.
What is wrong?
Oh, it is nothing.
Now that I actually get a break, I feel a little off.
Ranta-kun went out early this morning.
Really?
That is unexpected.
There are those people who get up earlier when they do not have to work.
Oh, he is one of them.
This bread's so good!
I do not have the timing down yet.
I am supposed to change the temperature in between...
It is our day off.
You do not have to worry about cooking duty.
Not that I do not appreciate it.
It is fine.
I happened to be hungry, too.
Where did Ranta go?
He had his fishing rod with him.
What about Yume and Shihoru?
I have not seen them all morning...
Maybe they are still in their room.
They probably stayed up late...
She and Yume probably talked about Manato.
What about you, Moguzo?
Me?
Well...
I am thinking of taking my armor in to get fixed.
It got pretty damaged in our last fight.
My weapon was beat up, too.
I left it to get sharpened.
Oh, I need to go pick it up!
Is not that what you usually do?
We hardly get days off.
What are you going to do, Haruhiro?
Me?
Me, huh...
We are all meeting at Shelly's Tavern in the evening, right?
Yeah.
What should I do?
Shihoru, I did not know you were up, too.
You... like birds?
I guess... it is just become a habit of mine.
Hmm...
Oh, Moguzo baked this new bread.
It smelled good.
Even from here?
Yeah.
I see.
We all watched the sunset from here, huh.
Yeah...
Um...
Haruhiro-kun.
I look forward to continue working with you.
Huh, what?
Same here.
Uh, what gives?
I just felt like it.
Oh...
The sunrise is beautiful from here, too.
I see.
That is why you come here so much.
Yeah.
Mm, Shihoru...
I am up, I am awake... awake...
Oh.
Haru?
Come sit.
I am staying here.
It is a lodging for women.
I have been here since I left the Volunteer Soldier lodging.
Wait, so I should not
On the terrace is fine.
If you plan to leave your lodging...
Yeah.
They would be happy to hear about here.
Well, they are probably pretty used to our lodgings...
I have a lot of memories... in those lodgings.
When Merry stayed at those dingy lodgings, she was...
What?
In Damuro?
Uh huh.
And it was super ferocious, yup.
There was a lin-gob or something there.
Uh, I only understood the ferocious part.
There were some newcomers, right?
Kie-roos.
Kie-roos?
Oh, rookies.
Were they Volunteer Soldier trainees?
Yeah, those.
Some kie-roo ty-par got into some trouble in Damuro.
It was bad, man.
I am pretty sure the goblins we defeated were from the new city.
Their equipment and the way they moved was completely different.
Since we defeated them
Yup, that is right.
Mad lin-gobs from the new city came and started angrily patrolling around.
And what are we supposed to do about it?
Leave them laying flat?
Like a pancake?
At least while they are piping hot.
Are you serious?
Hey, hey!
How is it going?
Keeping it up?
Two more over here!
Are the gobs making trouble?
Yeah, they are.
But the problem is that it is in Damuro.
You heard?
Yup.
So what are we going to do?
What?
Honestly, I have not thought about it.
We were planning on going to Damuro tomorrow...
If we go to Damuro tomorrow and do not earn anything, you better take responsibility for it, Haruhiro.
What do you mean by that?
I mean, you better show you mean it by paying up your portion.
Why do I have to do that?
And if we earn nothing, my portion is also nothing.
Well, how about we change our hunting grounds?
The Cyrene Mine.
Oh, uh, sorry, I was talking to myself.
Haruhiro!
You say some pretty good things once in a while.
And I mean once in a long while.
I am totally up for it!
Are you sure?
Is not Tetra Pods in the Cyrene Mine?
He is got a bounty of thirty golds!
It is not Tetra Pods but Death Spots from the Cyrene Mine.
No matter what, we will need to change our hunting grounds for a while.
But we do not know anything about other places, so I was wondering where we could go.
We can take extra precautions to avoid Death Spots.
And always being in the same area can get a little...
I guess, it feels boring.
We fall into a routine and make careless mistakes because of that.
Maybe it would be good for us to have some excitement or be under pressure once in a while.
Yeah...
I want...
Then...
Yeah.
Is it bad to do the same thing every day?
We have been in fewer dangerous situations lately...
I am okay with how it is now.
Yeah, it is just that we cannot go to Damuro right now...
Oh, right.
I guess it is our only choice then.
I guess if we change our prey, it will be a nice change of pace, huh.
Merry?
Wait...
I am sorry.
Merry!
I am sorry.
No, I should apologize.
If we go to the Cyrene Mine,
Merry will have to step foot in the place... where she lost her friends.
That would be difficult.
And very painful.
We actually have not been near the place where Manato breathed his last either.
It is to the point that I wish I could forget such a place exists.
In the Cyrene Mine...
I do not think I can be calm in the Cyrene Mine.
Not now...
Of course.
But, I have to overcome this.
No, I want to overcome this.
Otherwise, I feel like I will not be able to move on.
But, I know I cannot overcome it alone.
If I were to have help...
It would make me happy if I could go with you guys...
I am probably just causing you trouble.
You are not.
There is no way we would think of it like that.
Haru?
I wonder why...
Maybe these are tears of joy.
I feel stupid right now.
You are fine just like that, Haru.
Thanks.
We decided to be fully prepared before facing the Cyrene Mine.
We prepared our equipment and skills.
I decided to pay forty silvers and learn the sneak attack, Spider.
All right, let us get started, Old Cat.
I am counting on you!
You have gotten a little stiff since the last time.
Make sure only things that are hanging get stiff.
Uh, I am not stiff th
If you were, your neck could say goodbye to your body.
If I did not have my dagger, removing your neck vertebrae would not be bad either.
First step for you is to fully experience my Spider...
I will not die, right?
Not to worry.
There have only been a few people who have died from my training.
There were people who actually died?!
It is no use if you cannot stand.
Take a break.
You need to train even when you are resting.
Sit-ups, sit-ups!
Or would you rather do some training on how to withstand torture?
I will die!
For real!
Then why do not we just make small talk?
I I cannot!
You will do as you are told, idiot.
Small... talk?
I do not mind a little story, either.
I do not know any stories!
What a boring guy you are.
No wonder you cannot get any girls.
I cannot... deny that fact.
You have girls in your party, do not you?
Th-Three.
Make one of them yours.
Well, having all of them would be even better.
Er... I would rather not...
You are at least interested in one of them, are not you?
You just pictured someone, huh?
Oh yeah, teacher...!
I had something I wanted to... ask you about.
It has to do with women, right?
That is not it.
Oh-ho, you are changing the subject.
I do not have the energy to do that!
I see.
That is a pretty good sign.
A sign?
However, do not get the wrong idea.
It is not anything special.
I cannot get the wrong idea, because I have absolutely no idea what it is.
How dull can you be?
I guess you are an old cat, after all.
Dull?
Dull!
Although your intuition is not bad.
Anybody who is gained a lot of experience will see that streak of light at least once or twice.
In my case... it is not once a day... but I do see it pretty often
That is not unheard of.
It differs greatly from person to person.
How about you?
I see it here and there.
It is not something you can see just by concentrating.
I see...
To see it with more certainty, you need to improve your technique.
Your physical strength, too.
Y-Yes, madam!
If you have enough breath to say you do not have energy, I have not pushed you far enough!
It looks like a normal mountain.
Yeah.
Long ago, the Cyrene Mine was developed when the Arabikia Kingdom of humans...
Under the command of No Life King, a party of kobolds ousted the humans and seized the Cyrene Mine.
The kobolds have been living in the mine since.
All right.
Let us go.
When I try touching
the dry air after a rain,
like a sprouting flower,
fragments of memories overflow.
The warmth you gave this hand
led me to a future I can treasure
always.
I chased your voice.
I wonder when you became so strong.
I will probably find what I searched the vast world for
at the end of this journey.
Grimgar of Fantasy and Ash
How to Rest
Grimgar of Fantasy and Ash
I am Not Fit to Be a Leader
Also check out!
Goblin's
Journey
Now serialized on the official anime web site.
